column5: Does anyone have an update on Lac Seul Lost Lake area? Is the season late like reports from other areas of Lac Seul? How the water depth, higher than normal?

Water is average for this time of year. Fishing in the Lost Lake area has been good lately. Sandbars are hitting well in 6-12 feet. Most fish are still traveling along mainland shorelines as they transition between spawning areas and their summer haunts in the main lake basins.
